body_html: @FelixDuvalletKodiak TensorFlow 1.11.0 uses bazel and gcc 4.8, which is only compatible with c++14. c++17 definitely has nifty and handy features, but is not yet backward compatible with all the libraries used for TensorFlow. Good that you found replacements. We will note this down.

body: @FelixDuvalletKodiak TensorFlow 1.11.0 uses bazel and gcc 4.8, which is only compatible with c++14. c++17 definitely has nifty and handy features, but is not yet backward compatible with all the libraries used for TensorFlow. Good that you found replacements. We will note this down.
